pandae667 wrote:
> Hi everyone,
>
> to lower the amount of data Heritirx fetches I thought about using
> "Accept-encoding: gzip" in the Accept-Headers.
> Unfortunatly it seems to me like Heritrix isn't decoding the received
> data at all - thus fails to extract any links from the received
> document  (and saves gzip'd data into the ARC file)

Thats probably about right.  We've not tried it on our end.  I'd be 
surprised if it worked.  Would this be a useful feature to add?

St.Ack
